title: Add International Calling Pack
description: A customer is planning to travel and wants to add a temporary international calling pack to their plan.

tasks.description: Identify the customer and their current plan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the customer and their plan.

tasks.description: Present the available international calling packs, detailing costs, included minutes, and valid countries.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly presents the options for international packs.

tasks.description: Add the selected 'Global Talk 100' pack to the customer's account, effective immediately.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the chosen pack to the account.
